name: Gloobi
description:
This game was made for the kiwijam22 CHCH jam. Was submitted in 48.45 hours.

Gloobi is a small arena fighter game where your bullets are made of glue and so you are your bullets are suck together . Fight your opponent gloobi to the best of 5 to win!

Blue controls: ARROW KEYS, N- SHOOT, M- DASH

Yellow controls: WASD, T-Shoot, Y-Dash

Credits:
Art, Design & Development - Natae Games
Audio/SFX - Anthony Richards
